Guidance for Hand Winding Mechanism. Wind it in up to down direction until the winding stops. After winding pull the key Set the time in down to up direction & observe it will surely start. Guidance For Automatic Mechanism Please shake the watch in the circle direction for 2 mins watch will start Set the time Wear the watch because automatic mechanism demand the movement to run the watch.
